input.sentences: we took a trip to the ocean .
grandpa took the kids in the little boat .
they dangled their feet off the dock .
the boys posed for a picture .
output.sentences: Have you ever been on a trip in the ocean?
My grandma goes on ocean trips all the time.
She brings us kids on the boat with my grandpa.
He dangles is feet over the edge of the dock and gets his feet wet.
And of course, we have to take a picture with just the boys!
